data.title: Netviewer Meet Mobile 6.3 Free Download
data.meta_description: Netviewer Meet Mobile - You can participate in ad hoc web conferences and view the moderator’s screen with up to 100 people simultaneously. Reach decisions faster With...
data.text:
You can participate in ad hoc web conferences and view the moderator’s screen with up to 100 people simultaneously.

Reach decisions faster

With Netviewer Meet Mobile, you can immediately join meetings during critical situations, no matter where you are located. As a result, you are prepared to make important decisions.

Stay connected to the company

Netviewer Meet Mobile lets you join web conferences and discuss documents even when you don’t have access to a computer.

Save time and money

When you use the Netviewer Meet Mobile app, you have the ability to view remote computer screens as if you were on-site. You'll stay connected from any location around the world.

Web conferences made easy:

Go to www.Netviewer.com and click on the “Start a session” button to launch the moderator program of the Netviewer Meet web conferencing solution. Netviewer will generate a session number for you. People invited to join the conference simply enter the session number into the regular participant program or Netviewer Meet Mobile.

Joining a Netviewer meeting is free and requires only the session number and an Internet-capable PC, Mac, or smartphone.
